author: Unknown
content_text:
We're launching the beta testing of the Remote mode in Cellframe Dashboard!
Remote mode allows you to use Cellframe Dashboard without running a local node on the same device or downloading the full blockchain. To send transactions and interact with networks, the application will connect to a remote public node. There will be several such nodes, organized into a dedicated cluster, with load balancing handled by a DNS balancer.
Join the Cellframe beta testers group (
  t.co/QLLIGqbOKT
), take part in testing, and share your feedback!
#betatesting_cellframe

author: Unknown
content_text:
All these projects are built on the $ETH network.
Neither Solana nor XRP can even dance next to Ethereum.
Price is just an illusion Ethereum is the real deal.

Uniswap ( $UNI Decentralized exchange (DEX).
Aave ( $AAVE Lending and borrowing protocol.
Maker ( $MKR DAI stablecoin management.
Compound (COMP) Decentralized lending platform.
SushiSwap ( $SUSHI Community-driven DEX.
Curve Finance ( $CRV Stablecoin-focused DEX.
Balancer ( $BAL Automated liquidity pools.
Yearn-finance ( $YFI Yield optimization platform.
Synthetix ( $SNX Synthetic asset platform.
Chainlink ( $LINK Decentralized oracle network.

Ethereum is the foundation of real decentralization.

content_text:
What if stable liquidity could do more?
Balancer, in collaboration with
@usdx_money
, is revolutionizing stable asset liquidity with cutting-edge stablecoin tech and sustainable DeFi yields.
Curious? Letâ€™s break it down. ğŸ§µğŸ‘‡
Powered by Stables Labs,
@usdx_money
is a synthetic USD stablecoin built for DeFi.
â€¢ Censorship-resistant & scalable.
â€¢ ~$624M TVL demonstrates its trust and adoption.
â€¢ Offers global USD-denominated returns via funding rates & ecosystem yields.
  usdx.money/
Scalable, stable, and efficient.
USDX maintains peg stability through delta-neutral strategies, balancing derivative positions with collateral held by the protocol to ensure long-term stability.
  docs.usdx.money/
Supercharging stable liquidity, $sUSDX is the yield-bearing version of $USDX.
It automatically accrues returns through a rebase mechanism, combining funding rates, DeFi rewards, and protocol incentivesâ€”unlocking new layers of stable liquidity.
5/ The sUSDX | USDX pool on Balancer is setting a benchmark for YB stable liquidity on
@arbitrum
:
â€¢ ~$10M TVL
â€¢ Powered by Balancerâ€™s rate provider tech for optimized yield accounting.
â€¢ Deep liquidity for efficient trading.
Explore the pool:
  balancer.fi/
pools/arbitrum/v2/0xb3047330c1cb5eb1a3670fabfb99bdc106d631eb0000000000000000000005e4
6/ Stability and Chill
Diversifed stable liquidity and additional rewards with the USDX | USDT pool on Balancer:
â€¢ Deep liquidity for stable trading
â€¢ $BAL incentives for liquidity providers
  balancer.fi/pools/arbitrum/v2/...
)
7/ Whatâ€™s next for USDX and Balancer?
Plans are in the works to intergrate USDXâ€™s stablecoin infrastructure with Balancerâ€™s v3 boosted pool mechanics, delivering:
â€¢ Sustainable, organic yield generation.
â€¢ Enhanced liquidity efficiency through capital optimization.
8/ 100% Boosted Pool on Balancer v3 signify the next step in stable liquidity evolution.
These pools enhance yield by channeling all liquidity into an external yield market, boosting earnings while keeping capital accessible for swaps.
  x.com/Balancer/status/18852638...
  twitter.com/116288338270091264...
9/USDX and Balancer are redefining stable liquidity with cutting-edge innovation.
From thriving pools on Arbitrum to upcoming boosted pools on v3, the journey has just begun.
AMMs Made Easy.
  balancer.fi/

content_text:
Crypto Watchlist for the week ahead:
$UNI - Uniswap V4 goes live next week. It will enable the creation of highly customizable pools
$BTC - Next FOMC interest rate decision is scheduled for Jan. 29
$MODE - Mode will soon release Mode Terminal - an AI-powered interface that will simplify on-chain interactions
Quai - Quai Network will launch its mainnet on Jan. 29. Quai is a highly scalable Proof-of-Work blockchain
$BAL - Balancer V3 will go live on Arbitrum by the end of January
$SUI - $266M worth of SUI will be unlocked on Feb. 1
$MOVE - Movement Mainnet will launch in early February. Movement is a high-performance Move-based Ethereum L2
If you enjoyed reading this, a like + retweet would be appreciatedğŸ«¡

author: Unknown
content_text:
Introducing the Balancer v3 Codebase.
  medium.com/balancer-protocol/b...
1/ As we near feature completion for v3, we're opening the codebase to the broader ecosystem for feedback and contributions ahead of final audits.
Check out Balancer v3 at:
â€¢ Codebase:
  github.com/balancer/balancer-v...
â€¢ Documentation:
  docs-v3.balancer.fi/
2/Three years ago, we launched Balancer v2 to empower AMM innovation.
Although v2's versatility has been successful, its unopinionated architecture has resulted in complex custom pools, posing challenges for developers and integrators.
3/ Balancer v3 focuses on simplicity, flexibility, and extensibility.
New features include:
â€¢ Redesigned Vault
â€¢ Transient accounting system via EIP-1153
â€¢ Re-entrant pool lifecycle hooks
â€¢ Native support for yield-bearing tokens
â€¢ 100% boosted pools
4/ The v3 Vault provides a flexible but opinionated definition for Balancer liquidity pools.
By integrating common design patterns from custom pools on v2, it ensures consistency across all pools types and significantly simplifies pool contracts.
5/ Key Vault features include:
â€¢ Decimal scaling managed by the Vault
â€¢ Rate scaling optimized for yield-bearing liquidity
â€¢ Liquidity invariant approximation for unbalanced liquidity operations
â€¢ Transient accounting with EIP-1153 support
6/ â€¢ ERC20MultiToken for atomic updates
â€¢ Natively queryable to support complex operations
â€¢ Standardized swap fee management
â€¢ Pool creator fee to incentivize external AMM development
â€¢ Native pool pause management
7/ v3 remains a platform for AMM experimentation, enabling custom pools to iterate on existing swap invariants or define entirely new ones.
By shifting core design patterns from the pool to the vault, v3 achieves a balance between flexibility, complexity, and streamlined DX.
8/ In addition to custom pools, v3 introduces a new hooks framework to extend existing pool types during key lifecycle points.
The v3 vault formalizes hook definitions and transient accounting enables secure vault reentrancy, unlocking an infinite design space.
9/ To showcase the potential of hooks, weâ€™ve put together some simple examples:
â€¢ veBalDiscountHook
â€¢ LotteryHook
â€¢ ExitFeeHook
â€¢ FeeTakingHook
This is just the tip of the iceberg and weâ€™re excited to see what the broader ecosystem can create.
  github.com/balancer/balancer-v...
10/ First introduced in v2, Boosted Pools offered a novel solution to increase the capital efficiency of passive LPs.
The first iteration was constrained by the v2 vault architecture. However, with the innovations in v3, gas-efficient 100% Boosted Pools are now possible.
11/ In v3, Boosted Pools simplify swaps without needing BPT nesting. Instead, yield-bearing tokens are registered directly with the pool.
To facilitate gas-efficient swaps, v3 also introduces the concept of Buffers.
12/ Buffers act as two-token pools holding yield-bearing tokens and their underlying counterparts.
Swaps pass through Buffers, avoiding external calls if liquidity allows. For larger swaps, Buffers handle wrap/unwrap actions, ensuring LPs have 100% exposure to (YB) assets.
13/ Balancer v3 aims to provide a robust foundation to facilitate the creation of innovative products through its powerful and permissionless infrastructure.
14/ The simplification of custom pool development and the introduction of hooks reduce development time and effort required, making it easier for developers to innovate and bring new products to market.
To support this, the Balancer DAO is hosting the following initiatives.
15/ â€¢ Grants: The grants program will offer up to 150k $BAL over the next 6 months for projects building implementations on Balancer v3.
â€¢ Hooks Bounty Program: To encourage experimentation, Balancer Grants will be offering bounties for contributors creating new hooks on v3.
16/ v3 is about building for a better future and while the breadth of specific products that will emerge remains to be seen, it is up to the financial pioneers of our era to define the future landscape of DeFi.
